author: ryanleeschneider
content: Hey all, I wanted to get the ball rolling on updating the JSONRPC endpoints for EIP-1559 transactions.  To start, i think it's important for us to come to a rough consensus on _what_ sort of changes to make for these txs, then we can lock down names and format.  To get things started I created a new eth-magicians thread here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/jsonrpc-changes-for-type-0x2-eip-1559-transactions/6101
